entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 28. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear early this morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Wind east 30 km/h. High minus 28. Wind chill minus 49 this morning and minus 43 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 28. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind east 30 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 28. Wind chill minus 44 this evening and minus 39 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 19. POP 30%
